== Poovarany (628134) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Poovarany is a village in the [[Meenachil]] taluka of [[Kottayam]] district with an area of 2773 hectares and harbouring 3848 households with total population of 16102 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Palai]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 7959 and female population is 8143. Scheduled Caste Population is 701 and Scheduled Tribes population is 60. Census Location Code of the village is 628134<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 14328 (88.98%)
* Literate male population: 7063 (88.74%)
* Literate female population: 7265 (89.22%)
